mapper.insert: insert into goods(goodsid , usersid , goodsname , image , cateid , price , storage , addtime , hits , sellnum , contents ) values(#{goodsid} , #{usersid} , #{goodsname} , #{image} , #{cateid} , #{price} , #{storage} , #{addtime} , #{hits} , #{sellnum} , #{contents} )
mapper.update: update goods set usersid=#{usersid} , goodsname=#{goodsname} , image=#{image} , cateid=#{cateid} , price=#{price} , storage=#{storage} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} , sellnum=#{sellnum} , contents=#{contents} where goodsid=#{goodsid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.catename from goods a , users b , cate c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.cateid = c.cateid order by goodsid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.catename from goods a , users b , cate c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.cateid = c.cateid order by goodsid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.username , c.catename from goods a , users b , cate c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.cateid = c.cateid order by hits desc limit 5
select a.* , b.username , c.catename from goods a , users b , cate c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.cateid = c.cateid and a.cateid=#{cateid} order by hits desc limit 5
select a.* , b.username , c.catename from goods a , users b , cate c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.cateid = c.cateid and goodsid=#{goodsid} order by goodsid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.catename from goods a , users b , cate c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.cateid = c.cateid
